title: Promo's
body:
Hi,  :   )

This may not be a new idea,

If you get an -s, s or s+ in promos and you lose, it should not count as a loss or full loss.
{{champion:74}}

replies.body: Performance on a champion is not indicative of deserving a win or loss.

Also what is the max number of 's's achievable in a game?

can anyone see this?

meh.
